            double trueDifficulty,
            double averageDifficulty,
            boolean publicity)
        Constructor to set variables on initialization
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the quiz
        quizOwnerID - ID of the User who created the quiz
        quizTitle - Title of the quiz
        questions - Question list of the quiz
        customDifficulty - Custom difficulty (if defined) of the quiz
        trueDifficulty - True difficulty of the quiz
        averageDifficulty - Average difficulty of the quiz
        publicity - Publicity of the quiz
